Certificate Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the certificate

Complete the following:: GES 286 - Exploring the Environment: A Geo-Spatial Perspective (4)
GES 386 - Introduction to Geographic Information Systems (4)
GES 486 - Advanced Applications in Geographic Information Systems (3)
or GES 488 - Spatial Data Analysis and GIS Applications (3)

Complete 9 credits from the following, i: GES 481 - Digital Image Processing for Environmental Applications (3)
GES 486 - Advanced Applications in Geographic Information Systems (3) (if not used above)
GES 488 - Spatial Data Analysis and GIS Applications (3) (if not used above)
